defining_moments.title: Overcoming Stage Fright at Debate
defining_moments.description: During my first debate competition, I froze on stage, forgetting my arguments. This experience taught me the importance of preparation and self-confidence, leading to my eventual success in public speaking.

defining_moments.title: Failed Science Experiment Turned Success
defining_moments.description: A failed chemistry experiment in class led me to discover a new method for conducting reactions. This taught me the value of persistence and creativity in problem-solving.

defining_moments.title: Navigating Team Conflict in Robotics
defining_moments.description: A disagreement within my robotics team threatened our project, but mediating the conflict taught me leadership and collaboration skills. This experience highlighted the importance of communication and compromise.

model_extra.essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?

essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?
